attributes.description: CD PLAYER, We at Stander Motors pride ourselves in delivering excellent service. We go the extra mile to give our clients only the best. attributes.description:
Price: R369900
Mileage: 135000km
2014 Audi S3 2.0 TFSi S Tronic S line for sale.
S 3 Audi with loads of power in a sedan setup. Equally at home with the family on the open road as on a racing track.
Standard Features: ABS Brakes | Air Conditioning | Airbags | Central Locking | Climate Control | EBD | Electric Windows | PDC | Multi-Function Steering | Power Steering | Radio/CD | Bluetooth | Sports Leather Seats | Keyless Go | Xenon Headlights and more
Car has full service history and spare key.

Trade-Ins are Welcome.
Finance can be arranged with all major banks with a additional administrative fee.
Warranty options are available.

Audi S3 STronic
Power - 206 kW @ 5500 rpm
Torque - 380 Nm @ 5500 rpm

Emissions Rating - EU6

Top Speed - 250 km/h

Seats - 5
Fuel Tank Capacity - 54 litres
Boot Capacity - 425 litres
